message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $14,000. I think you'll find it's a very fair price considering its value.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to sell the product. However, I am only able to pay up to $13,000 for it. I hope this revised offer meets within your acceptable range.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but I can't go as low as $13,000.  Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $13,500?
I appreciate your prompt response, Alice. While I understand your position, I am still unable to meet you at $13,500. I would like to propose $13,200 as my maximum offer for the product.
